|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "NWR11B" and "3762-02140002" is silkscreened on the board.
"WRT11B REV:A" and "3762-02140001" is silkscreened on the board on the FCC photos. The FCC ID printed on the unit (Q87-NWK11B) is invalid. The actual FCC ID is Q87-NWR11B. NWR11B serial numbers appear to start with '''CFZ0'''. OD/ID measurements may not be exact ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Network Everywhere NWR11B board top.jpg|board top File:Network Everywhere NWR11B board bot.jpg|board bottom
